Text.Page:
I'm glad to hear Poihon's on his way. We can certainly use his expertise while he's hereâ€”we haven't nearly enough fortifications.

What we do have are dracoloths, and a never-ending demand from the Mysterium for dracoloth hearts.

They won't tell us what they do with them, but it's not lost on me that if they're useful, the giants used them too.

Hunting dracoloths is hazardous work, but the gold's good. Interested? Head south to Barbtail Coulee.

Thank you, .

The Mysterium will make good use of these I'm sure. What use that is, I couldn't say.
We need all of these we can get, but I can't pay for fewer than three.
